Uses of Class
org.openmap4u.plugin.builder.chart.PieChart

  • Packages that use PieChart 
    Package Description
    org.openmap4u.plugin.builder.chart
    Basic charts plugins: Line-, Area-, Bar- and Piechart.

    • Uses of PieChart in org.openmap4u.plugin.builder.chart

      Methods in org.openmap4u.plugin.builder.chart that return PieChart 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PieChart PieChart.add(double value)
      Adds a new value in percent of the whole circle.
      PieChart PieChart.color(java.awt.Paint strokeColor)
      Sets the stroke color.
      PieChart PieChart.diameter(double diameter)
      Sets the diameter (or in the case of an donut the outer diameter).
      PieChart PieChart.end(double endAngle)
      Sets the end angle.
      PieChart PieChart.fill(java.awt.Paint strokeFill)
      Sets the sroke fill.
      PieChart PieChart.innerRadius(double innerRadius)
      Sets the inner radius (in the case it is a donut).
      PieChart PieChart.outerRadius(double radius)
      Sets the outer radius (in the case it is a donut).
      PieChart PieChart.radius(double radius)
      Sets the radius (=outer radius of an donut).
      PieChart PieChart.size(double strokeSize)
      Sets the stroke size in stroke units.
      PieChart PieChart.start(double startAngle)
      Sets the start angle.
